places.name: Market Square Gwarinpa
places.address: Along Kado-Gwarinpa Expressway, Gwarinpa Estate, Abuja
places.description: A modern supermarket and mini-mall featuring groceries, household items, a bakery, fresh produce, and dining spots imbuing Gwarinpa with a fresh, contemporary commercial atmosphere

places.name: Bricks n More
places.description: A modern commercial complex featuring fully glazed shopfronts, elevator access, underground parking, and round-the-clock security

places.name: Citec Villas & Private Cinema
places.address: Citec Villa Estate, 4th Avenue, Gwarinpa, Abuja
places.description: An upscale gated community featuring high-end duplexes, ensuite blocks, swimming pools, and even private cinema rooms

places.name: Efab Estate Residential Area
places.description: A gated sub-estate with paved roads, street lighting, communal amenities like gyms and pools, appreciated for its enhanced security and quality residential environment

places.name: Gwarinpa Housing Estate
places.description: The largest single housing estate in West Africa, spanning ~1,090ha with wide avenues, diverse architectural styles, and well-structured phases

places.name: Crush Café
places.address: Bonny B Corner Shop, 1st Avenue, Gwarinpa Estate, Abuja
places.description: A spacious café and sports lounge with outdoor seating under palm trees, known for its delicious menu, lively atmosphere, ping-pong & volleyball area, plus welcoming open-air vibes

places.name: Gwarinpa/Jabi Lake
places.address: Adjacent to Jabi Lake Mall, Jabi Gwarinpa Expressway, Abuja
places.description: A scenic, man made lake covering about 1,300 ha, set within Jabi Lake Park. A peaceful oasis for picnics, jogging, boating, and bird watching

places.name: Urban Castle Suites
places.address: House 9, Road 9 (off 69A32 Road), Gwarinpa Estate, Abuja,
places.description: A family-friendly 4-star hotel and suites with garden, restaurant/bar, free parking, room service, and 24hour front desk
